member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink
member.summary: A link connecting a streaming writer to a streaming reader through a buffer. Should be used to enable multithreading by linking sequential processes avoiding tempfiles (piping). Safe for a single reader and writer to be in different threads. It is possible to pass the written data on to an underlying stream. Use another DirectLinkStream as passthrough to feed multiple spawned threads processing data.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_lock
member.summary: Main lock to synchronize operations between reader and writer. Used to protect accesses to all state vars and making decisions on blocking thereon.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_signalDataAvailable
member.summary: An event to wake reader.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_signalBufferAvailable
member.summary: An event to wake writer.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_autoDisposeCounter
member.summary: Track closes and enable threadsafe self dispose.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_written
member.summary: Number of bytes written to buffer.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_read
member.summary: Number of bytes read from buffer.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_writerClosed
member.summary: If the writer is closed.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_readerClosed
member.summary: If the reader is closed.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_buf
member.summary: The buffer for piping.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_passWriteThrough
member.summary: A stream to pass writes to. For stream stacking.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_knownLength
member.summary: Allows to set a length for SubStreams Length property.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_enforceKnownLength
member.summary: If set the length is enforced as follows: EndOfStreamException On Write() if writer tries to write more bytes. EndOfStreamException On Read() if reader tries to read more bytes after writer has closed before knownLength.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_blockOnFlush
member.summary: Forces to wait until reader has consumed all bytes from buffer on a Flush operation. Set via constructor.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_blockOnClose
member.summary: Forces to wait until reader has closed its stream on writer's Close operation. This may be used to synchronize worker threads. Set via constructor.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_readerStream
member.summary: The helper stream for reader from pipe.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.m_writerStream
member.summary: The helper stream for writer to pipe.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Sets up the DirectStreamLink with a certain behaviour.
member.param: The size of the internal buffer to use.
Specifies to block Flush until reader has read buffer empty. This is not suited for synching.
Specifies to block close of writer until reader has closed. Can be used for synching.
A stream all written data is just passed to. For stream stacking.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.ReaderStream
member.summary: The Stream to read from the link.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.WriterStream
member.summary: The Stream to write to the link.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.SetKnownLength(System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows to set and optionally enforce the length of the piped data if known before. This may help consumers that need a length for correct operation. Set length to negative value if length is not known (default).

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read bytes from the Pipe. Blocks if none available. Redirected from ReaderStream.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write bytes to the Pipe. Blocks if buffer full. Redirected from WriterStream.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes class. Is triggered automatically as soon as reader and writer are closed.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.LinkedSubStream
member.summary: Common base class for reader and writer.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.LinkedReaderStream
member.summary: The class for readig from DirectStreamLink.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.LinkedWriterStream
member.summary: The class for writing to DirectStreamLink.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump
member.summary: A helper class to transfer data asynchronously from one stream into another. Handles exceptions, takes care of closes when done and is suited to be used with syncing-on-Close in DirectStreamLink's. When data is transferred, streams are closed by default (see constructor).

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.MINBUFSIZE
member.summary: Minimum buffer size for pumping

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.DEFAULTBUFSIZE
member.summary: Default buffer size for pumping

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Action{SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates and configures a new DataPump instance.
member.param: The stream to read data from.
The stream to write data to.
The internal buffer size for reading/writing.
A callback to issue when pumping is done but before streams are closed. e.g. Can add data to output.
Disable auto close of input stream when pumping is done.
Disable auto close of output stream when pumping is done.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.BytesPumped
member.summary: Returns number of bytes currently transferred.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.WasStarted
member.summary: Returns if the DataPump was started.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.IsRunning
member.summary: Returns if the DataPump is still running.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.Exception
member.summary: Returns an exception if any occured in

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.WaitHandle
member.summary: Returns a wait handle for synchronization (only if created on Run).

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.RunInThreadPool(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts transfers via ThreadPool. Returns immediately

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.RunBlocking
member.summary: Runs DataPump blocking. Can be used with Task class when calling from higher .Net Framework. Returns number of bytes pumped. Rethrows exceptions if any on Read() or Write().

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.DirectStreamLink.DataPump.doRun(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Actually transfers stream data.

member.summary: Enumerates the possible modes for encryption and decryption

member.summary: Indicates encryption, which means that the stream must be writeable

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.OperationMode.Decrypt
member.summary: Indicates decryption, which means that the stream must be readable

member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the version is readonly when decrypting

member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the requsted operation is unsupported

member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the requsted operation is unsupported

member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the requsted operation is not available.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Strings.BufferTooSmall
member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the requsted operation is not available.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Strings.DataHMACMismatch
member.summary: An exception message that indicates that the data has been altered

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt
member.summary: Provides a stream wrapping an AESCrypt file for either encryption or decryption. The file format declare support for 2^64 bytes encrypted data, but .Net has trouble with files more than 2^63 bytes long, so this module 'only' supports 2^63 bytes (long vs ulong).

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.MAGIC_HEADER
member.summary: The header in an AESCrypt file

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.MAX_FILE_VERSION
member.summary: The maximum supported file version

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.BLOCK_SIZE
member.summary: The size of the block unit used by the algorithm in bytes

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.IV_SIZE
member.summary: The size of the IV, in bytes, which is the same as the blocksize for AES

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.KEY_SIZE
member.summary: The size of the key. For AES-256 that is 256/8 = 32

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.HASH_SIZE
member.summary: The size of the SHA-256 output, which matches the KEY_SIZE

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.DEFAULT_THREADS
member.summary: Default number of threads to use

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_stream
member.summary: The stream being encrypted or decrypted

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_mode
member.summary: The mode of operation

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_payloadStream
member.summary: Helper payload stream for decryption, hiding bytes

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_cryptDataStream
member.summary: Top of stack / end of pipe stream performing crypt operation. Actual Type depends on threading mode.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_cryptoThreadPump
member.summary: The main (first tier) DataPump when multi-threading (null otherwise). Used for synchronization and exception detection.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_hmac
member.summary: The HMAC used for validating data

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_length
member.summary: The length of the data modulus

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_helper
member.summary: The setup helper instance

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_extensions
member.summary: The list of extensions read from or written to the stream

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_version
member.summary: The file format version

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_maxCryptoThreads
member.summary: Set number of threads to be used for crypto-operations: 1 for no multithreading at all, 2 for separate hashing, > 2 for AES-stream splitting

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_hasWrittenHeader
member.summary: True if the header is written, false otherwise. Used only for encryption.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_hasFlushedFinalBlock
member.summary: True if the footer has been written, false otherwise. Used only for encryption.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_readcount
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the encrypted stream. Used only for decryption.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_paddingSize
member.summary: The number of padding bytes. Used only for decryption.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_hasReadFooter
member.summary: True if the header HMAC has been read and verified, false otherwise. Used only for decryption.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_nextBlock
member.summary: Buffer to support read-ahead on decrypt.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_curBlock
member.summary: Buffer to support read-ahead on decrypt.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.m_curBlockBytes
member.summary: Number of bytes in read-ahead buffer.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Crypto
member.summary: Helper property to ensure that the crypto stream is initialized before being used

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.InitStreamsDecryption
member.summary: Init streams for decryption. Simple stack for single thread. For multithreading, sets up pipes and runs data pumps.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.ReadEncryptionHeader(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Helper function to read and validate the header

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.InitStreamsEncryption
member.summary: Init streams for encryption. Simple stack for single thread. For multithreading, sets up a pipe and runs data pump.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.WriteEncryptionHeader
member.summary: Writes the header to the output stream and sets up the crypto stream

member.summary: Writes an extension to the output stream, see: http://www.aescrypt.com/aes_file_format.html

The data to set in the extension

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.ClosingCryptoStream
member.summary: Private helper class fixing a bug in .NET: CryptoStream fails to close it's base stream on a cryptographic exception (last block incomplete). This class forces a close on exception for erroneous streams. Necessary to allow threads to end.

member.summary: Internal helper class, used to prevent a overlay stream from closing its base

member.summary: The wrapped stream

The number of bytes to read

True if the file-size check should be ignored, false otherwise. Only use this for error recovery modes
Maximum threads allowed for SharpAESCrypt.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.#ctor(System.String,System.IO.Stream,SharpAESCrypt.OperationMode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a new AESCrypt instance, operating on the supplied stream
member.param: The password used for encryption or decryption
The stream to operate on, must be writeable for encryption, and readable for decryption
The mode of operation, either OperationMode.Encrypt or OperationMode.Decrypt
Skip file size check on seekable streams. For disaster recovery.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version number. Note that this can only be set when encrypting, and must be done before encryption has started. See MAX_FILE_VERSION for the maximum supported version. Note that version 0 requires a seekable stream.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.MaxCryptoThreads
member.summary: Gets or sets how many threads may be used for crypto-operation. 1 is single thread, 2 dual threads to decouple hashing, > 2 multithreads aes (decryption only). Note that this must be done before en-/decryption has started.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Extensions
member.summary: Provides access to the extensions found in the file. This collection cannot be updated when decrypting, nor after the encryption has started.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.CanRead
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can read.
member.value: true if this instance can read; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.CanSeek
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can seek.
member.value: true if this instance can seek; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can write.
member.value: true if this instance can write; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Flush
member.summary: Flush this instance.

member.summary: Gets the length.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.Docs: The stream does not support seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
member.summary: Seek the specified offset and origin.
member.param: Offset.
Origin.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.Docs: The stream does not support both writing and seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
member.para: A stream must support both writing and seeking for SetLength to work.
member.summary: Sets the length.
member.param: Value.

The offset into the buffer
The number of bytes to read

member.summary: Writes unencrypted data into an encrypted stream
member.param: The data to write
The offset into the buffer
The number of bytes to write

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.FlushFinalBlock
member.summary: Flushes any remaining data to the stream

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the instance, and flushes any data currently held, into the stream

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.SharpAESCrypt.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main function, used when compiled as a standalone executable
member.param: Commandline arguments

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper
member.summary: Splits data into stripes that are written to several stripe streams in round robin order. Between stripes an overlapping is inserted (thus, last bytes from previous chunk are repeated). For reads, the inverse operation is performed and the overlap is removed on the fly. It can be tracked via an event if necessary (i.e. for verification). While writing, the event can also be used to modify the overlap data.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs
member.summary: Argument class for OverlappedBlockChanging event.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs.PreviousStream
member.summary: The stream containing the block just completed.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs.NextStream
member.summary: The stream containing the block just starting.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs.OverlapFromPrevious
member.summary: The overlapping bytes from the stream with the previous block.

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs.OverlapOnNext
member.summary: The overlapping bytes in the stream with the next block. In Split mode, modifications by the handler will actually be written to the stream.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets up an instance of OverlappedBlockChangingEventArgs

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChangingEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate for OverlappedBlockChanging event.

member.name: E:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OverlappedBlockChanging
member.summary: This event let's you track whenever and an overlap is inserted (Split) or discarded (Join) on a block change (chunk complete). In Split mode, it let's a handler modify the bytes used as overlap. In Join mode, it can be used to verify correct operation (compare overlaps). Note: For writes, the event is (obviously) triggered before the overlap is written. For reads, the overlap is read from NextStream to be returned, but no data ahead is read.

member.name: T:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.Mode
member.summary: The mode of operation for OverlappedStreamStriper

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.Mode.Split
member.summary: Use OverlappedStreamStriper in Split-Mode (write-only stream).

member.name: F:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.Mode.Join
member.summary: Use OverlappedStreamStriper in Join-Mode (read-only stream).

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.#ctor(SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.Mode,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.IO.Stream},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets up a striper with the specified parameters.
member.param: Specify whether this instance will be used for splitting or joining streams.
List of streams to chunks are striped to / from.
The size of each block after which to move to next stream (without overlap).
The number of bytes the chunks are overlapped with.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.OnOverlappedBlockChanging(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Internally handles OverlappedBlockChanging and raises event.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.setNextStream
member.summary: Returns whether the stream index was actually changed or stays the same.

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.CanRead
member.summary: Returns whether this instance is suitable for reading (Join mode).

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.CanWrite
member.summary: Returns whether this instance is suitable for writing (Split mode).

member.name: P:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.CanSeek
member.summary: Always false, OverlappedStreamStriper cannot seek.

member.name: M:SharpAESCrypt.Threading.OverlappedStreamStriper.Flush
member.summary: Flushes all stripe streams.

member.summary: Always throws NotSupportedException.

member.summary: Always throws NotSupportedException.

member.summary: Always throws NotSupportedException.

member.summary: Always throws NotSupportedException.
